resources.string: CREATE TABLE [phones] ( [id] TEXT UNIQUE PRIMARY KEY, [brand] TEXT NOT NULL, [model] TEXT NOT NULL, [price] REAL DEFAULT 0, [iconResName] TEXT, [providers] TEXT );
CREATE TABLE [tablets] ( [id] TEXT UNIQUE PRIMARY KEY, [brand] TEXT NOT NULL, [model] TEXT NOT NULL, [price] REAL DEFAULT 0, [iconResName] TEXT, [size] INTEGER DEFAULT 0 );
CREATE TABLE [watches] ( [id] TEXT UNIQUE PRIMARY KEY, [brand] TEXT NOT NULL, [model] TEXT NOT NULL, [price] REAL DEFAULT 0, [iconResName] TEXT, [isCircular] INTEGER DEFAULT 0 );
